posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
This build is very much inspired by Maximillan Kane.

Hope he is enjoying life wherever he is!

I've made some adjustments to his great build to add divine damage and delightful saves from Divine Grace. I think a Base AB of 38 would be good enough with all the cleric goodness available.

A base Cha of 24 when capped at 36 would mean a 13 round duration divine might +13 divine damage per hit, which could be up to 5 times / round with DP and haste.

I took cons 8 because of undispellability + endurance should be enough to boost the HP up enough. Mords will be a worry but thankfully with the caster levels one should be somewhat mord resistant

Ideal domains I thought would be Travel (for undispellable extended haste yes please!) and Trickery (again undispellable improved invisibility yes please!)

And some skill points to keep the trap setters happy! hooray!

Anyway haven't play tested it so I've put this in the unfinished section!

There are Heavy Perma-Haste crossbows available.

Yep.

So taking the Animal Domain would be an option (for that sweet increased level Summons).

Nope.

Travel and Trickery on WoG (if the Deity selection thing is still working) is only available under Sehanine Moonbow, so Elves and Half-Elves, only.

Onwards!

RE: WoG
Sehanine Moonbow requires one to be chaotic good or chaotic neutral :( so no can do if we want paladin in this

I know Animal and Plant is considered optimal... Heironeous? Law and War domains might not be too bad. Battle mastery duration is 5 rounds + charisma modifier, so 20 rounds with +7 AB/damage is pretty sweet. Law domain to access the lesser mind blank spell which will be undispellable with all those cleric levels. Plus aura of vitality / cats grace is pretty good. St Cuthbert might not be too bad either for Strength / Law domains / protection
